title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 400.3 - Reference standards
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 400.3 - Reference standards

State Regulations
(a) Tests to
determine the effective area of all orifice plates used in testing steam meters
shall be made at least once each six months, and a record of these tests shall
be retained for a period of two years. (b) The gauges, scales, thermometers, etc., used in making tests shall be calibrated at intervals consistent with good
laboratory practice. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
400.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
